title: Mermaid storage unit

properties.name: description
properties.value: The mermaid storage unit was a location in a vast ocean south of Great Kourend. It is unknown what was here, aside from the assumption that mermaids inhabited these waters.

content:
Mermaid storage unit was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
The mermaid storage unit as it appeared on the official world map.
Its location in relation to the world map at the time it was removed.

The mermaid storage unit was a location in a vast ocean south of Great Kourend. It is unknown what was here, aside from the assumption that mermaids inhabited these waters.

On 21 January 2016, the mermaid storage unit was removed from the official world map. According to Mod Ash (jokingly), the mermaid storage unit has sunk.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 20 January 2016. (Archived from the original on 30 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "It [The mermaid storage unit] sank."
